message.entry: The number of 3-D points must match the number of point tracks.
The number of 3-D points must match the number of image points
bundle adjustment stopped because the magnitude of the gradient of the squared reprojection error was less than the default tolerance.
bundle adjustment stopped because the change of the input variables was less than the default tolerance.
bundle adjustment stopped because the number of iterations reached the specified maximum value.
bundle adjustment stopped because the relative change in the squared reprojection error was less than the specified relative tolerance value.
bundle adjustment stopped because the mean squared reprojection error was less than the specified absolute tolerance value.
bundle adjustment stopped because the Levenberg-Marquardt algorithm failed to converge. Check reprojection errors to see if they are acceptable.
Mean reprojection error before bundle adjustment: {0}.
Mean reprojection error after bundle adjustment: {0}.
The number of cameras must match the number of camera poses.
The number of feature points in view {0} must be greater than or equal to {1}.
